name: autobem
description: Automatically convert styles for a section of markup into BEM

scripts.build: ./node_modules/uglify-es/bin/uglifyjs chrome/js/calculate-specificity.js chrome/js/units.js chrome/js/styles-calculator.js chrome/js/style-tree-node.js chrome/js/style-tree.js chrome/js/css-exporter.js chrome/js/dialog.js chrome/js/main.js --source-map -o chrome/script.js

author: Joe Forshaw
